channel.title: Minecraft not opening
channel.description:
Here is the error: [code] Problem signature: Problem Event Name: APPCRASH Application Name: javaw.exe Application Version: 6.0.310.5 Application Timestamp: 4f2c9e1c Fault Module Name: atiumdag.dll Fault Module Version: 8.14.10.700 Fault Module Timestamp: 4ab43a44 Exception Code: 80000003 Exception Offset: 0021983a OS Version: 6.1.7601.2.1.0.768.3 Locale ID: 1033 Additional Information 1: 1ec0 Additional Information 2: 1ec0fd70d07d060e5bfcf53c69ad1739 Additional Information 3: 2c48 Additional Information 4: 2c48940de5e7d1cb2e131ad6a0ca2feb
Read our privacy statement online: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=104288&clcid=0x0409
If the online privacy statement is not available, please read our privacy statement offline: C:\Windows\system32\en-US\erofflps.txt [/code] I basically try to open MC and the screen goes grey and doesn't open. Has this happened to anyone else and how did you fix it? I updated java hoping it would be fixed but nothing happened.

item.title: Minecraft not opening
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:437588”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=540293.msg3956728#msg3956728 date=1332818778]

if you dont have any sound, the problem is java7

I use jre7u2. I have no issues lol.

dunno then because my sound didnt work 90% of the time when i updated to java 7, and its not like i have outdated hardware, my computer is still high in the ranks
[/quote]

Sound has always been like that on minecraft. Sometimes it just quits working and I have to restart the client to get it back. It shouldn’t have anything to do with hardware.[/quote]

happens to me on linux

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft not opening
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:

if you dont have any sound, the problem is java7

I use jre7u2. I have no issues lol.

dunno then because my sound didnt work 90% of the time when i updated to java 7, and its not like i have outdated hardware, my computer is still high in the ranks
[/quote]

Sound has always been like that on minecraft. Sometimes it just quits working and I have to restart the client to get it back. It shouldn’t have anything to do with hardware.[/quote]

i downgraded to java6 and sound works everytime now.

with java7 i literally had no sound at all, not even upon client restart or anything

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft not opening
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Here is the error:

Problem signature:
  Problem Event Name:	APPCRASH
